topics.title: Community Growth
topics.summary: npmx has experienced significant growth, surpassing 500 members and reaching 2,000 stars on GitHub. This milestone reflects the increasing interest and engagement within the community, indicating a positive trajectory for future developments and collaborations.

topics.title: Celebratory Milestones
topics.summary: The community is celebrating the achievement of 2,000 stars on GitHub, marking a significant milestone for npmx. This achievement is a testament to the hard work and dedication of its members, fostering a sense of accomplishment and motivation for future goals.
